videoPrompt.prompt:
Create a 7-second animated fantasy action sequence video. Reference attached images for character designs and style.

SHOT 1 (0-2 seconds): A young hero in DARK BLUE and GOLD adventure gear with short messy brown hair LEAPS through the air toward a massive ancient stone guardian robot. A small glowing orb companion blazes beside him like a comet. Dramatic slow-motion jump.

SHOT 2 (2-4 seconds): The hero's fist connects with the glowing blue core in the guardian's chest. "CRAAAACK!" effect. Cracks of light spread across the guardian's entire body.

SHOT 3 (4-7 seconds): The guardian EXPLODES in brilliant blue-gold light! The hero lands heroically as the light fades, his orb companion spiraling around him in celebration. The ancient shrine transforms - flowers blooming, sunlight breaking through. VICTORY!

Style: Pixar-style 3D animation, ancient temple setting, epic boss defeat energy, dramatic lighting, triumphant music feeling.
